pages.text: As you explore the world, you should find these $(l:kingdomkeys:blox/prize)Blue and Yellow cubes with stars$() in the middle of them. These cubes can be mined with a pickaxe and have the chance to drop new $(item)spells$() for you to learn.

When you learn these spells, they can be cast from your $(thing)Magic$() command menu tab, as long as you have the MP to cast them. If you run out of MP, it will take some time to recharge.$(p)You'll usually receive your $(thing)first MP with Level 4$(). Prior to that, you won't be able to cast any spells.
